title: Trump wants Greenlanders to join the US. His comments are making that harder.
desc: Even residents open to independence from Denmark have been put off by the president’s bullying tactics.

title: Denmark and allies boost Greenland military footprint as Trump ramps up pressure
desc: The deployment comes as U.S. President Donald Trump intensifies talk of taking over the Arctic island.

title: Denmark, Greenland failed to win the Trump team over
desc: The U.S. allies hoped meeting senior Trump officials would diffuse tensions and tough talk on Greenland. It didn’t.

title: 'We're in a bad spot': Fed leaders push back on Trump's attacks on Powell
desc: The rebukes from regional Fed officials are landing as the White House faces a cascade of criticism over the criminal inquiry into the central bank chair.

title: The Fed chair race is becoming a proxy war for central bank independence
desc: The investigation into Fed chief Jerome Powell could have a lasting impact on President Donald Trump's ability to shape the central bank.

title: Latino voters powered Trump’s comeback. Now they’re turning on his economy.
desc: Hispanic small business owners are souring on the Trump economy, a warning sign to Republicans ahead of this year’s midterms.

title: Alina Habba wants her old job back
desc: DOJ appeals ruling that disqualified New Jersey's top federal prosecutor.

title: Is Gavin Newsom really turning the corner on homelessness?
desc: POLITICO reporters dig into the latest California’s homelessness estimates that Gavin Newsom is pointing to as evidence of progress on a longstanding problem.

title: FBI agents search home of Washington Post reporter
desc: The feds seized a cellphone and Garmin watch from reporter Hannah Natanson’s home but told her she is not the target of the investigation.

title: Trump has no plans to endorse in final 3 Senate races
desc: Cassidy, Collins and Cornyn are the only Republican senators facing voters this fall without Trump's official backing.

title: Schumer thinks these four states will deliver for Dems in November
desc: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer, along with a Democratic Senatorial Campaign Committee memo shared with POLITICO, laid out their strategy for Democrats’ path back to the majority.

title: Peltola raises $1.5M in first 24 hours of Alaska Senate bid
desc: Democrats are hoping the former member of Congress can flip GOP Sen. Dan Sullivan’s seat.

title: ‘Abolish ICE’? Many Democrats are ready to fund it — with conditions
desc: It's not clear a Homeland Security funding bill can get done, but furious negotiations are underway.

title: Trump says he has many military options on Iran. He doesn’t.
desc: Many of the troops and ships once at the president’s disposal have shifted to the Caribbean.

title: Newsom has a $200M carrot to bring automakers back to the table
desc: State funding for electric vehicle rebates could help broker a detente between California and Detroit.
